items.Question: How do I search for a building?
items.Answer:
STEP 1:

  Go to the Map page.

			STEP 2:

 Click on Search icon (magnifying glass) at the top left of the screen.

			STEP 3:

 Scroll through the list of Buildings and select the desired one.

			STEP 4:

 Click “Ok”The Map will then focus on the desired building. 


			A pane slides up at the bottom of the screen with more details about the building.

items.Question: How do I import my Google Calendar?
items.Answer:
Make sure to create a Google Calendar separately for your Course schedule.
 The name of the Google Calendar should be @Concordia and 
all the events within this calendar should have a prefix “@Concordia”. 
			
For example:

			Name of Calendar:

 @Concordia

			Event1:
 
@Concordia SOEN 390

			Location: 

FG-B050

			Once you have your calendar ready, you can proceed with the steps below:


			STEP 1: 

Swipe the slider of the screen and select “Calendar” option from Menu

			STEP 2:

Login to your Google account to import your calendarYou should be now able to see the calendar when the authentication process is over. 


			You can toggle between the days to see the schedule for different days of the week

items.Question: How do I set Notifications for Next Class?
items.Answer:
Make sure to have your School calendar uploaded from Google. If this is not done, the notification for next class event will not work. 

			To see the details on how to import Google calendar, refer to FAQ “How doI import my Google Calendar?”

			STEP 1: 

 Swipe the slider of the screen and select “Settings” option from Menu

			STEP 2:  

Turn on the “Event Notification” option

			STEP 3: 

Turn on the different types of alert in section “Events and Notifications” according to your preferences.

			You will receive notification on your phone 15 min before your next class.
